artist: Francesco Mazzola (Il Parmigianino); After Raphael Sanzio
creditline: Gift of funds from Janet and Winton Jones in memory of Thirza Jones Cleveland
dimension: 10 11/16 x 15 7/8 in. (27.15 x 40.32 cm) (sheet, trimmed within platemark)
provenance: George Rath, Lugt 1206 (1828-1904), Budapest; [Olimpia Theodoli, London, until 1999; sold to MIA]
title: Saints Peter and John Healing the Sick at the Gates of the Temple
